attributes.action: remove copyright restrictions for the puplication of past exam papers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many exams, resources are supplied which are vital in order to answer the questions. However, students who download past exam papers are often faced with blank pages and the words "this extract has been removed due to third party copyright restrictions."

This denies students the oppourtunity to practice this skills they require for their exams, and renders some past exam papers totally useless (OCR Critical Thinking Unit 1, for example). 

In the interests of improving education, past exam papers should be made available, in full, to all students.
